title: Emerald & Diamond Dewdrop Jhumka - లక్ష్మీ డిజైన్ జుమ్కాలు
materials: Emerald Center Stones. Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Classic Jhumka design with intricate filigree detailing, reminiscent of traditional Telugu craftsmanship. The earring features a floral and heart-shaped diamond-studded top with a vibrant emerald center stone. The bell-shaped jhumka is adorned with a delicate lattice pattern of diamonds and finished with hanging pearl dewdrops for an elegant sway. Lakshmi (లక్ష్మీ) motifs are subtly incorporated into the top design, signifying prosperity and good fortune.
colors: complemented by the sparkle of white diamonds
the vivid green of the emeralds
and the soft creamy white of the pearls.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase your traditional roots with a touch of elegance. Also suitable for modern fusion outfits.
description: This Jhumka beautifully blends traditional South Indian design with the timeless appeal of diamonds and pearls. The intricate filigree work, the auspicious Lakshmi motifs, and the high-quality gemstones make this a truly heirloom-worthy piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. These earrings are not just jewelry; they are a celebration of South Indian culture and craftsmanship.
